item.title: Photo Finder Script(s)
item.description: This post contains information about creating various Windows powershell scripts to assist with managing our photos.

item.title: PowerShell
item.description: PowerShell is a task automation and configuration management framework from Microsoft, consisting of a command-line shell and associated scripting language.

item.title: ssh - Secure Shell Protocol
item.description: The Secure Shell Protocol (SSH) is a cryptographic network protocol for operating network services securely over an unsecured network. Its most notable applications are remote login and command-line execution

item.title: Strings (PowerShell)
item.description: This page provides examples about the use of PowerShell strings and string functions.
